description: This file defines the UserRepository class implementing IUserRepository, providing database access methods related to User entities, including retrieval, addition, update, and friendship checks, within an Entity Framework Core context.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: Repository class for User data management, implementing IUserRepository interface.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a User by their unique identifier asynchronously.

methods.name: GetByEmailAsync
methods.description: Fetches a User by email asynchronously.

methods.name: GetByUserNameAsync
methods.description: Fetches a User by username asynchronously.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Adds a new User entity to the database asynchronously.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Updates an existing User entity in the database.

methods.name: IsFriendAsync
methods.description: Checks if two users are friends based on accepted FriendRequest records.

methods.name: GetFriendsAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a list of friends for a specific user.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Commits pending changes to the database.
